name: Life After End
storyline:
Got wet in the rain? Got sick. Is it too hot? Dehydration. Have you been on your feet for a day? Be prepared for overwork. You can lose your life if you meet a wild animal or another player. Who knows what awaits you on the way?

Save money; prepare to defend yourself from enemies; look for food and shelter, as well as friends and allies. Two will take away much more than one, and there will be someone to cover his back in case of trouble, of course, if he does not hit it himself. In general, think about your every step and do not be afraid to make mistakes, because this is the only way to stay alive.
summary: Life After End is a harsh and cruel representative of the Survival Horror genre, where you have to survive in post-apocalyptic Siberia. Be prepared for harsh climatic conditions and realistic gameplay.
